topics.title: What's the best way to socialize my puppy?
My sister's cat loves to eat butter off the counter, does anyone else's cat do this too or just him?
I think my bearded dragon is upset with me but I don't know why. Help!

messages.title: play with other dogs
messages.messageText: Get your puppy outside and make sure they play with lots of other dogs so they can get used to different attitudes and behaviors.

messages.title: are you sure it's mad at you?
messages.messageText: sometimes I feel like my bearded dragon Stacy is mad at me but she's really just hungry for some flies.

messages.title: get it a friend
messages.messageText: My bearded dragon buddy was always down in the dumps until I got him a friend to play with. Now he's happy all the time

messages.title: play with other animals, and take them out often
messages.messageText: make sure you play with them and introduce them to strangers and other animals. that way they will be used to the world around them

messages.title: what did you do
messages.messageText: It must be mad at you for a reason. If you think really hard, you might be able to remember why it's upset at you! Then you can mend the bridge between you two.

messages.title: why would you want to socialize them
messages.messageText: I like my puppies not social

messages.title: yeah actually it's so weird!
messages.messageText: My cats do this too. They are such unique little fluff balls!

messages.title: Train them while they're young!
messages.messageText: You simply must train them while they are very very young to get the absolute best results possible.
